div.p: Delroy, Youth Worker. It’s providing a service in the community to provide a safe environment for kids to be able to come to and
express themselves whichever way they like to – through music, drama, cooking, sports, yeah so it’s an open range of different activities
to encourage young kids to stop hanging around on the street and get engaged with positive things in their community.
We’ve got about 90 kids on our books now, I’ve got about 15 staff who work for me both paid and volunteers and yeah
we’ve created something that’s new, people want to buy into it...
